name: Bun Escape
description:
Bun Escape is a short vertical platformer, which took roughly three months to create in Construct Classic.

This is my first completed project and as such is fairly rough around the edges, but I hope you have fun playing it!

Keyboard Controls;

Move - Arrow keys
Jump - Z
Start - Enter

Controller;
Move - Analog or D-pad
Jump - A (or whatever is mapped as "A")
